text:
both the oneform and the forms editor rely on string operations to manipulate
xml content. that is bad practice, because it can lead to syntactically
incorrect xml and makes the code very fragile. instead, the content should be
represented as a DOM tree (rather than its serialization to text) and all
manipulations should happen with DOM library methods.
creator: nettings@apache.org
